name: MarqVision
headline: IP operating software for brands and content companies
description:
MarqVision’s mission is to protect and build a future shaped by original ideas, innovations, and creativity. As a leading online brand protection solution, we help global brands identify and remove counterfeits and combat piracy from over 1,500 platforms and thousands of rogue websites in over 118 countries. In a time when counterfeiting poses an increasingly serious challenge, we believe that democratizing legal expertise and access to the latest in generative AI technology is critical for continuing to support the inventors, developers, and artists of the world who work tirelessly to deliver safe, high-quality products.

MarqVision’s technology powers everything from detection, monitoring, and even enforcement to protect brands at scale. Founded in 2020 by Harvard Law graduates, MarqVision is proudly backed by Altos Ventures, DST Global Partners, Softbank, Atinum Investments and Y Combinator. Our commitment to innovation has also been recognized with a prestigious 2022 Innovation Award from LVMH Louis Vuitton Moët Hennessy (LVMH), and we are honored to be part of the LVMH accelerator program, La Maison des Startups, at the Station F incubator. As we bring forth the next evolution of brand protection, we invite businesses everywhere to join us in safeguarding the creativity that drives our world.

founders.name: Mark Lee, Founder & CEO
founders.description:
CEO & Founder at MarqVision
Harvard Law School (JD)
Harvard College (BA)
McKinsey & Company

generated_description:
**MarqVision: Safeguarding Originality in the Digital Age**

Founded in 2020 by Harvard Law graduates, MarqVision is on a mission to safeguard creativity. Based in Los Angeles, CA, the company has cultivated a team of around 200 employees and has garnered the backing of prominent investors, including SoftBank and Y Combinator. Their unique selling proposition? They combine cutting-edge technology with legal expertise to combat counterfeiting and piracy on a global scale.

**What They Do**

MarqVision offers a comprehensive suite of services centered around intellectual property (IP) protection for brands and content creators. They operate across more than 1,500 platforms worldwide and adapt to the local nuances of over 118 countries. Essentially, they provide:

1. **Brand Protection**: A full marketplace coverage service that detects and removes counterfeit goods and impersonations while delivering seller network intelligence.
2. **Content Protection**: Cutting-edge tools for detecting pirated content, managing illegal listings, and implementing search de-indexing.
3. **Legal Services**: Access to expert legal teams that include in-house Asian law firms, providing field investigations and offline raids when necessary.
4. **Trademark Management**: A streamlined platform for registering, renewing, and monitoring trademarks with a refund guarantee.
5. **Impersonation Protection**: Immediate defenses against impersonation across all channels.

**Innovative Edge**

MarqVision harnesses the power of generative AI to enhance its effectiveness in detecting and mitigating risks. Their AI technology mimics the expert judgment of seasoned professionals, analyzing intricate datasets that include counterfeit behaviors and platform-specific nuances. This functionality enables them to surface insights rapidly, reducing enforcement actions from 20 hours a week to mere clicks.

Moreover, 2022 marked a significant milestone for them as they received the LVMH Innovation Award, further signaling their commitment to innovation within the legal tech space.

**Clientele and Coverage**

Their solutions are tailored for a number of industries, notably beauty and fashion, attracting clients from a diverse array of leading brands, including Wella, Stussy, and Allbirds. As they look forward to 2025, they're set to roll out latest innovations, key hires, and a new series of webinars, underscoring their promise of continuous evolution in brand protection.

**Conclusion**

In summary, MarqVision is not just another tech company; it’s a beacon for brands looking to protect their creative endeavors in an increasingly digital world. By marrying AI with legal prowess, they not only defend against counterfeiting but also empower creators and businesses to thrive without the constant shadow of infringement. As brands face mounting challenges in protecting their IP, MarqVision stands at the ready, a stalwart guardian of originality. 

For more details, visit [MarqVision](https://www.marqvision.com/).
